security_audit.summary: This skill contains only a YAML frontmatter metadata file with no executable code, no network calls, no filesystem access, and no external command execution. It is a pure prompt-based skill that defines only a simple text prompt for API-related tasks.

content.value_statement: Building APIs can be complex and time-consuming. This skill provides focused prompts to help design, implement, and test API endpoints efficiently.

use_cases.title: Design RESTful APIs
use_cases.description: Create well-structured REST endpoints following best practices

use_cases.title: Build API integrations
use_cases.description: Connect frontend applications to backend services

use_cases.title: Document API endpoints
use_cases.description: Generate clear API documentation and OpenAPI specs

prompt_templates.title: Basic endpoint
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a simple REST API endpoint that returns user data.

prompt_templates.title: Full CRUD API
prompt_templates.prompt: Build a complete CRUD API with create, read, update, and delete operations for a resource.

prompt_templates.title: API with auth
prompt_templates.prompt: Add JWT authentication to an API endpoint with role-based access control.

prompt_templates.title: API documentation
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate OpenAPI documentation for an existing REST API with all endpoints.

output_examples.input: Create a simple REST API endpoint that returns user data
output: Returns user objects with id, name, email
Includes error handling for invalid requests

best_practices: Use RESTful conventions for endpoint design
Include proper error handling and status codes
anti_patterns: Returning too much data in responses
Not using proper HTTP status codes

faq.question: What tools support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code AI assistants.

faq.question: What are the rate limits?
faq.answer: Rate limits depend on your AI assistant subscription plan.

faq.question: Can I integrate this with my existing API?
faq.answer: Yes, use the prompt templates to guide the AI in working with your specific API.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: This skill only provides prompts and does not store or transmit any data.

faq.question: Why is my API not working?
faq.answer: Ensure your API follows REST conventions and check your endpoint URLs and methods.

faq.question: How does this compare to Postman?
faq.answer: This skill guides AI assistants while Postman is a manual testing tool. Use both together.
